dk8:7: trayāṇāṁ sannipātāj jāyate yā hi vedanā
dk8:10: sparśapratyayā vedanā katamā | āha | cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṁ | trayāṇāṁ sannipātāt* sparśaḥ | sparśapratyayā vedanā |
dk8:11: evaṁ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥ pratītya dharmāṁś cotpadyate manovijñānaṁ | trayāṇāṁ sannipātāt* sparśaḥ | sparśapratyayā vedanā |
dk8:12: api khalu cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṁ | trayāṇāṁ sannipātāt* sparśaḥ sukhavedanīyo duḥkhavedanīyo ’duḥkhāsukhavedanīyaḥ | tat khalu sukhavedanīyaṁ sparśaṁ pratītyotpadyate sukhā vedanāsukhavedanīyaṁ sparśaṁ pratītyotpadyate duḥkhā vedanā | aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṁ sparśaṁ pratītyotpadyate duḥkhā vedanā | aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṁ sparśaṁ pratītyotpadyate aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā | tad ucyate sparśapratyayā vedanā |
dk8:13: api khalv evam uktam āyuṣmatā ānandena ghoṣilasya gṛhapater |
dk8:14: anyo ca gṛhapate cakṣurdhātur anyo rūpadhātur anyaś cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ | sukhavedanīyaṁ gṛhapate dvayaṁ pratītya vijñānasyotpādo bhavati | trayāṇāṁ sannipātāt* sparśaḥ | tat khalu sukhavedanīyaṁ sparśaṁ pratītyotpadyate sukhā vedanā | anya eva yāvad | duḥkhavedanīyaṁ gṛhapate dvayaṁ pratītya vijñānasyotpādo bhavati | trayāṇāṁ sannipātāt* sparśaḥ duḥkhavedanīyaḥ | tat khalu duḥkhavedanīyaṁ sparśaṁ pratītyotpadyate duḥkhā vedanā | anya eva yāvad | aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṁ gṛhapate dvayaṁ pratītya vijñānasyotpādo bhavati | trayāṇāṁ sannipātaḥ sparśaḥ aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaḥ | tat khalv aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṁ sparśaṁ pratītyotpadyate aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā |
dk8:15: anya eva gṛhapate śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanodhātur anyo dharmadhātur anyo manovijñānadhātuḥ | sukhavedanīyaṁ gṛhapate dvayaṁ pratītya vistareṇa yathā pūrvoktaṁ | tad ucyate sparśapratyayā vedanā |
dk8:16: api khalv evam uktaṁ bhagavatā mahānidānaparyāyesmin vyākaraṇe āyuṣmate ānandāya |
dk8:17: asti pratyayam ānanda vedanā vistareṇa yāvac | cakṣuḥsaṁsparśaś ced ānanda nābhaviṣyad api nu cakṣuḥsaṁsparśapratyayam adhyātmam utpadyeta sukhaṁ vā duḥkhaṁ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṁ vā | no bhadanta |
dk8:18: evaṁ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamahaḥsaṁsparśaḥ ced ānanda nābhaviṣyad api nu manaḥsaṁsparśapratyayam adhyātmaṁ utpadyeta veditaṁ sukhaṁ vā duḥkhaṁ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṁ vā | no bhadanta | sarvaśo vā ānanda sparśe asati vedanā prajñāyeta | no bhadanta | tasmād dhy ānandaitan nidānaṁ vistareṇa yāvad | idaṁ mayā yad uktam idaṁ tat pratyuktaṁ ||
